paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In the third germline sample with a pathogenic BRCA2 mutation, no somatic alterations in BRCA1/2 or in other HR genes were observed.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with a pathogenic effect leading to frameshift.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was identified in a patient with a high HRD score.
key_quotes: In the third germline sample with a pathogenic BRCA2 mutation, no somatic alterations in BRCA1/2 or in other HR genes were observed.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: only one patient exhibited concurrent high HRD score and SBS3, and this patient harbored a BRCA2 mutation that was classified as benign (T582P, clinvar variant accession VCV000037753.10).

functional_data.summary: The variant is classified as benign and does not contribute to disease.

variants.additional_notes: The patient with this variant did not show any disease manifestations.
key_quotes: only one patient exhibited concurrent high HRD score and SBS3, and this patient harbored a BRCA2 mutation that was classified as benign (T582P, clinvar variant accession VCV000037753.10).

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
